main_definition: Bolivia is a country in South America, officially known as the Plurinational State of Bolivia.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A place name referring to Bolivia or related to Bolivian culture
meanings_and_examples.example: We traveled across multiple countries including Bolivia during our trip.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiomatic expression used in some contexts, although not commonly recognized as a standard idiom
meanings_and_examples.example: This phrase may be mistakenly used to refer to Bolivia due to its geographical location in South America. However, it is not an established idiom.
